php.LBL_MAIL_RBL_DESCRIPTION: Configurez les serveurs de messagerie RBL pour détecter le spam et définir les expéditeurs de confiance.
php.LBL_FRAUD_ATTEMPT_TO_PERSUADE_PEOPLE_TO_: [Fraud] An attempt to persuade people to buy a product or service
php.LBL_SECURITY_ATTEMPT_TO_IMPERSONATE_ANOT: [Security] An attempt to impersonate another person
php.LBL_SECURITY_ATTEMPT_TO_PERSUADE_FROM_OR: [Security] An attempt to persuade the recipient to open a resource from outside the organization
php.LBL_SECURITY_ATTEMPT_TO_PERSUADE_INSIDE_: [Security] An attempt to persuade the recipient to open a resource inside the organization
php.LBL_REPORT_WHITE: Request IP to be added to whitelist
php.LBL_REPORT_BLACK: Report IP to be added to blacklist
php.LBL_REPORT_MODAL_DESC_WHITE: Thank you for sending us your IP whitelist request. Only reputable IPs (belonging to trusted and well-known companies) can be added to our database. Please justify your request in the "request details" field and include all important information in the description, eg a link to your website. Submissions are verified manually, so it's a good idea to submit as much information as possible. The current status of the application can be checked at: https://soc.yetiforce.com/.
php.LBL_REPORT_MODAL_DESC_BLACK:
Thank you for sending us your IP blacklist report. Describe exactly why we should block this IP address in the "report details" field, any additional information will be helpful. Submissions are verified manually, so it's a good idea to submit as much information as possible. The current status of the application can be checked at: https://soc.yetiforce.com/.
For companies and individuals who consistently break the law, we may take additional legal action to force the illegal activity to stop. In addition to legal actions, we may report violations to other institutions and systems that protect the end user on other layers (e.g. in the browser while browsing websites).
php.LBL_ALERT_FAKE_SENDER: L'adresse e-mail dans le champ De a été falsifiée.
php.LBL_SERVER_NAME_FROM_DESC: The server name that the sending computer gave for itself (often the sending software name)
php.LBL_SERVER_NAME_BY_DESC: The server name that the recipient computer gave for itself (often the sending software name, if there is no sender, the message is passed internally)
php.LBL_SPF_NONE_DESC: Impossible de vérifier si le serveur de l'expéditeur est autorisé à envoyer des messages au nom de '%s'
php.LBL_SPF_PASS_DESC: Le serveur expéditeur est autorisé à envoyer des messages au nom de '%s'
php.LBL_SPF_FAIL_DESC: Le serveur expéditeur n'est pas autorisé à envoyer des messages au nom de '%s'
php.LBL_DKIM_NONE_DESC: La signature numérique (DKIM) n'a pas été configurée sur le serveur de l'expéditeur
php.LBL_DKIM_PASS_DESC: La signature numérique du serveur de l'expéditeur (DKIM) correspond à la signature numérique de l'expéditeur.
php.LBL_DKIM_FAIL_DESC: La signature numérique (DKIM) du serveur de l'expéditeur ne correspond pas à la signature numérique de l'expéditeur ou a été falsifiée.
php.LBL_DMARC_NONE_DESC: Aucune donnée pour confirmer le domaine de l'expéditeur
php.LBL_DMARC_PASS_DESC: Le serveur expéditeur a la confirmation du domaine de l'expéditeur
php.LBL_DMARC_FAIL_DESC: Le serveur expéditeur n'a pas de confirmation du domaine de l'expéditeur
php.LBL_NO_DMARC_DNS: Aucun enregistrement DMARC publié dans '%s' DNS
php.LBL_UPLOAD_WRONG_FILE: Please upload correct file to import IP addresses
